results.name: The x coordinates of the stripe enumeration of N X N where N = {0, 1, 2, ...}.
comment: See A319571 for comments and references.
link: Index entries for sequences related to coordinates of 2D curves
program: # Function stripe is defined in A319571.
x, y, state = stripe(x, y, state)
xref: Cf. A319571 (stripe enumeration), this sequence (stripe x), A319573 (stripe y).
